objects.name: Analytic 1497
objects.description: Processes (e.g., bash, python, custom binaries) dynamically linking libcrypto/libssl for RSA key exchange, then creating external connections with abnormal certificate validation or handshake anomalies. Defender observes syscall traces and outbound asymmetric key exchanges from non-SSL-native processes.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execve or socket/connect system calls for processes using RSA handshake

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: linux:syslog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Non-standard processes negotiating SSL/TLS key exchanges

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: linux:osquery
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Processes linked with libssl/libcrypto performing network activity

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Baseline libraries that normally handle asymmetric crypto.
Threshold for client-heavy data sending vs server.
